review: 我不知道该怎么说，删除了问问国服所有的数据，暴雪根本不在乎，还是我，内心百感交集五味杂陈，我也想辱骂他，来倾泻我的不公平我的感受，只能怪你的决定让人愤恨暴雪，如果是16年我会好评。

验证妮玛呢，国服这么多人说关就关？自己做得跟垃圾一样，内测我都开始玩了 现在完全失望，死吗的暴雪,不想开国服就滚
The thing is, I would give it a chance if the PvE content was more than 30 mins long. Also, gating heros behind a battle pass is something that needs to die stop giving them your money

Sadly, after all the years of loving this game, I still find it to be fun, but I would't recommend it. Some of my problems:

- people don't care about MMR or SR,  they'd rather throw/leave than accept they are not playing right, or they don't even know how to play because the were lucky to win(getting carried) enough in QP before learning the game - they should not play PVP yet.. 

-a lot of passive AFK/roaming in rank games... people just stay there and they are not getting a ban, the report for game-play sabotage doesn't work at all (at least that's what I saw during this years of gaming)

- I love skins, but OW 1 was cheaper at times than some skins in this game, I'd rather buy other games to play.. with that money - or buy a gym membership, food... IDK anything else but those overpriced skins and I do spend a decent amount of money on games and micro-transactions, but I haven't spent a dime in OW2, they don't deserve it

- PVE, biggest trolling for OW1 players, I don't necessary want the PVE(it would be trash anyway, it's Blizzard at the end of the day). But they at least should give us something to compensate for years of hype and no updates on OW1. (idk, better(working) report system, better game modes, bring 6v6 game-type as an alternative back... something)


But don't let my rating stop you from playing, you can see how bad it is yourself :D Honeymoon phase doesn't last long with this game. If you'll like the game, good for you/us, it means there might be some hope at the end of the day. 
------
For better days! If the game gets good I'll come back and write an update.

The game is fun, but Blizzard is really momless, and it's really hard to accept that a game that I used to love so much is now being criticized, but I also had to join in. Overwatch is my guide, and it is not the humiliating beast who destroys Overwatch, but Blizzard himself.

你说得对，但是《守望先锋》“归来”是一款免费的第一人称射击游戏，每位英雄各具特色，角色阵容不断扩充，战斗紧张刺激，地图遍及全球。可以与好友组队投入惊心动魄的5v5团战，或与全新的强大敌对势力殊死搏斗。

Tenho 700+ horas de jogo na Battle.Net, jogo desde o Overwatch 1.
Personagens cativantes, história muito bem feita, mapas bonitos, músicas incríveis.
A jogabilidade é frenética, mas ainda assim estratégica.

Temos muitos problemas sim com a Blizzard, mas não conseguimos largar o jogo pois ele é incrível!

Espero que agora na Steam além de conquistas, os devs possam abrir mais coisas legais como cartas colecionáveis e badges, assim como itens para a loja de pontos!

什么？这不是守望先锋2啊🙌，这是暴雪木琴的古灰盒，体积小方便携带👍，拆开一包✋😀，放水里就散开，怎么找都找不回来，用来泡水😋😋，冲厕所，拖地都是很好用的😋😋，你看打开以后像奶茶粉一样碎👍✋，放在水里遇水溶解不见，溶解性很强的。冲开以后，是一杯强效加量的洁厕灵，你看它怎么用都用不完👍👍，不掉伤手不伤地，使用一辈子都没问题，大扫除带上它非常方便，用它洗袜子，再拖地板，冲厕所，干净卫生。什么?在哪里买?👆👆右上角寿衣商店，买一盒送一盒😋😋😋😋😋😋

Step 1: Create a sequel to house an all-new "extensive PvE experience"

Step 2: Use the sequel to start charging more for individual cosmetics than some devs charge for entire games, and get rid of the loot box mechanic that allowed unlocking those cosmetics for free through gameplay

Step 3: Scrap the "extensive PvE experience" you've been talking about for years and that was the entire reason you gave for making the sequel

Step 4: Profit $

Optional step 5 for the truly greedy: Proceed to release limited PvE content similar to the old free event PvE missions and lock it behind a paywall

Step 6: Profit $$$
